data.title: Frederick William III, King of Prussia, and his wife, Queen Louise, in Paretz in 1800
meta_keywords: House of Hohenzollern;Hohenzollern;dynasty;monarchy;royal;monarch;monarchs;kings;history;noble;nobility;illustration;illustrations;German;Prussian;Paretz Palace;Paretz;couple;queen;consort;king;Prussia;family;Louise of Mecklenburg-Strelitz;Queen Louise;children;garden;walk;walking;Frederick William III;Friedrich Wilhelm III;19th Century;King of Prussia;wife;Carl Rohling
data.meta_description: Download stock image of “Frederick William III, King of Prussia (1770–1840), and his wife, Queen Louise (1776 -1810), in Paretz in 1800. Paretz Palace was the summer residence of the royal couple. Illustration from House of Hohenzollern in Pictures and Words by Carl Rohling and Richard Sternfeld. Published by Martin Oldenbourg in Berlin, c 1900.” from the Look and Learn History Picture Archive
data.meta_site_name: Look and Learn History Picture Library
